name: Horatio Wagglesnatch
description:
Made for Wildjam 30. Theme Heartbeat with wildcard Arcade.

You are Horatio Wagglesnatch AKA the Twilight Cervil - sneak into the arcade museum, avoid the cards, steal the antique game controllers.

Note the instructions in game aren't very detailed:

Use the mouse to move.

Press [Space] in time with your heart rate in order to stay alive.

You can carry only one controller "Loot" at a time, return it to the chest at the start of the level for points.

You can play a game within the game:

Number pad to move

[Space] to teleport

-----

3D Assets, Code and SFX all made by me. 

Other credits:

Font is 8-bit wonder by Joiro

Game within the game assets by Kenny

Godot Assetlib Resources:

CRT shader by hiulit

PathCamera3D by Janders
